text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: From the inside it's Special Week! From the inside it's Special Week! Extending her lead from 3 to 4 lengths, now she cross the goal!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: As her first victory in a Major, the [Kisaragi Sho] has been conquered!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: [Special Week swept away her previous loss with an overwhelming victory!] [With the Classics in sight for Special Week, next is the Yayoi Sho!]

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Ehehe… seeing yourself in an article, is a little embarrassing, isn't it?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Spe-chan, being the victor is best! Since the fans are hoping for a strong Uma Musume!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: When a classmate is getting this kind of attention, somehow it makes you feel kinda proud too, huh?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: You say that but, Sei-chan is undefeated so far- and they're saying you're a strong contender for the Classic races.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Well～, isn't that just a coincidence?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Everyone seems to be in top condition, don't they?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Ooohoohoohoo! If we're talking about strong contenders, you can't exclude me, King!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: King-chan, in your last race, it's too bad that you got 2nd.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: O-Oohoohoohoo! Even if I lose I won't be defeated, that's what it means to be a first class Uma Musume!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: That aside, Special Week-san, your next race is the [Yayoi Sho] is it not?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Yeah, that's right, but why are you asking?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: In that case, before a real Classic race, I'll have you show me what you can do.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: My next race is also the [Yayoi Sho] after all.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: …Eh?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Huh? Wait, Sei-chan, isn't your next race the [Yayoi Sho] too?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Yeah, King and Spe-chan, go easy on me～

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Eh…? Eh…?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: EEEEEEHHHHH～?!

text_block_list.name: TV Announcer
text_block_list.text: [Seiun Sky has decisively pulled away! She's pulled really far ahead and now, crosses the goal!]
In her next race, the [Yayoi Sho], finally, it'll be the first contest between Special Week and the champions of her generation.
She was working hard to produce results, so I also had to give my all to respond to that and go through these documents.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Staying behind again to do more research?
Even at the best of times, it won't be easy to obtain glory in a classic race, especially since we're competing with the "Golden Generation".
But, Spe is seriously doing her best to grasp it. For the sake of her dream, I need to properly support her.
But, Spe is seriously doing her best to grasp it. For the sake of her dream, I need to properly support her.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: …Trainer-san, you truly never change it seems.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Becoming an Uma Musume's support, and taking hold of their dream together. Ever since conquering the Tenno Sho, you've always been like that.
While saying that, there was a deep emotion in Mejiro McQueen's gaze.
Her dream of "Conquering the Tenno Sho", for someone who had just recently been put in charge of a team it was a huge dream.
Compared to when Team was on the verge of breaking up, it's become quite lively.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Yes, truly…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: That said, this time, the dream is quite difficult, isn't it? After all, the goal is to "Become Japan's #1 Uma Musume".
While saying it would be difficult, Mejiro McQueen looked like she was having fun talking about it.
She probably also believes in it. That Team 's Special Week could fulfill her dream.
choice_data_list: I'll definitely show you we can do it

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: We, as a team, will also do our best.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Um, and after that… [To aim for Japan's #1, first is the Yayoi Sho].

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: A letter to your mother?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Yeah, it'd probably be faster to talk over the phone but, it's also kind of embarrassing to put it in to words, don't you think?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: That's why I'm writing a letter like this. To say I'm doing my best to aim for "Japan's #1 Uma Musume"!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: …Fufuu

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Huh…? Did… I say something weird just now…?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: No, that's not it. I was just thinking that Spe-chan really cares for her mother.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Ehehe… it's because I'm really grateful to my Mom! For raising me with so much affection, to both of my Moms!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: To both of your Mothers… you say?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Suzuka-san, I have two Moms. The Mom that gave birth to me and, the Mom that raised me.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: From both of those Moms, I've been entrusted with the dream of becoming "Japan's #1 Uma Musume".

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Originally, "Japan's #1" was my birth mother's dream.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: But, due to circumstances, she wasn't able to run in a single race, and she wasn't able to chase after her dream.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: While she was pregnant with me, it seems that she half-joked that it would make her happy if the child she was carrying would become "Japan's #1 Uma Musume", or so I'm told.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: And that she wanted to see that dream together with me- …but, she passed away shortly after I was born…

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Is that so…?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Aaahh?! Don't look so down! Besides, I wanted to tell you about how great my mom was, so that's why I'm talking about it!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: And so, a really good friend of hers took me in, became my mom, and raised me as her own.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: It seems like the moment she'd take her eyes off me I'd go running off, and it sounded like I was quite a handful as a kid, though…

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: …Fufuu.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: And then, after I had grown a bit, I was told about my birth mother's dream — to become "Japan's #1 Uma Musume".

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: …Truthfully, I was asked many times whether I really wanted to become "Japan's #1 Uma Musume". I was told I didn't need to push myself and carry that dream.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: …But, Spe-chan, becoming "Japan's #1 Uma Musume" was what you chose, right?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Yeah! Becoming "Japan's #1 Uma Musume", and making both of my Moms happy!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Also, when I won my debut race, I made a promise with Suzuka-san, right?! That we'll definitely fulfill our dreams!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: For my Moms, and for the sake of the promise I made with Suzuka-san, I'll definitely show you I can win the [Yayoi Sho]!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Fufuu, I'm looking forward to it.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Ehehe… Yeah!
